name: Ocean Odyssey
description:
"Experience the oceans of the world, and the myriad of creatures that call them home, in glorious high-definition VR" is what this blurb would say if this was anything other than a prototype.

The prototype allows you to explore a number of interconnected lagoons and display information about the creatures found there.

The main purpose of this was to give me an excuse to play around with VR, but also, more specifically, also to test gaze selection and whether it is possible to have continuous movement without causing nausea or dizziness in the viewer.

Feel free to give it a try and let me know what you think...
